text: ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنزَلَ عَلَىٰ عَبْدِهِ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ وَلَمْ يَجْعَل لَّهُۥ عِوَجَا ۜ

translation.en.sahih: [All] praise is [due] to Allah, who has sent down upon His Servant the Book and has not made therein any deviance.
translation.id.indonesian: Segala puji bagi Allah yang telah menurunkan kepada hamba-Nya Al Kitab (Al-Quran) dan Dia tidak mengadakan kebengkokan di dalamnya;
